## Variables

```{r frequency of use}

party_panel <- read.csv("Party_Panel.csv") 
party_panel <- party_panel[-27,] # remove final row with summed rows
party_panel <- as.data.frame(apply(party_panel, 2, as.numeric))

frequency_use <- with(party_panel, sum(Gebruik * Frequencies) / sum(Frequencies))

frequency_var  <- with(party_panel,
                  sum(Frequencies * (Gebruik - frequency_use)^2) /
                  (sum(Frequencies) - 1) ) 

frequency_sd   <- sqrt(frequency_var)

```
